s.text: They tell you that vitamin E, Grape juice, and aspirin Thin the blood and Reduce cholesterol buildup But if you take two Or three of these Substances regularly, do they Thin it too much, Causing other, unforeseen Dangers of an interactive sort?

They tell you that vitamin E, Grape juice, and aspirin Thin the blood and Reduce cholesterol buildup But if you take two Or three of these Substances regularly, do they Thin it too much, Causing other, unforeseen Dangers of an interactive sort?
